metadata.name: WMI Backdoor Exchange Transport Agent
metadata.comment: Detects a WMI backdoor in Exchange Transport Agents via WMI event filters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\edgetransport.exe')) AND NOT (lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\system32\\\\conhost.exe') OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\microsoft\\\\exchange server\\\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\bin\\\\oleconverter.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects a WMI backdoor in Exchange Transport Agents via WMI event filters
